question:
Read the following sustainability report and complete the following tasks:

────────────────────
### 1.	Decide on one overall transparency score for the company.
Choose **exactly one** of these lowercase labels:

• very poor  
• poor  
• moderate  
• reasonable  
• high  
• unknown

────────────────────
### 2.	Output format
Return **only** this JSON block—nothing else:

```json
{
  "score": "<one of: very poor | poor | moderate | reasonable | high | unknown>",
  "reasoning": "<1-3 sentences citing concrete report evidence (page/section numbers if available).>"
}
```
